name: wader
content:
wader noun
(BIRD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a bird with long legs and a long neck, that lives near water and eats fish
Chaithanya Krishna Photography/Moment/GettyImages

wader noun
(BOOTS)
waders [ plural ]
rubber boots that cover the whole leg to keep a person dry in water: The fishermen put on their waders.
